price: Ugupimwa kw’ibikorwa vy’ibiremwa ku musi w’izuka, kuzogirwa ku munzane w’ukuri utarenganya namba. Uwo wese rero ibikorwa vyiwe vyiza bizoremera ku munzane, azoba rero ari mu bantu baronse intsinzi y'Ubwami bw'ijuru;
arabic: وَٱلۡوَزۡنُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

meta.transliteration: wal-waznu yawma-idhin al-ḥaqu faman thaqulat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
